backend/main.mo: Motoko backend canister defining user profiles, wallets, investments, transactions, referral earnings, and access‑controlled methods for managing them.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing deployment‑related features, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend source files describing UI components, pages, and styling.
frontend/docs/deployment-failure-investi: Documentation detailing a frontend deployment failure, its root cause, required fixes, and verification steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH theme variables and dark/light mode tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entrypoint loading the frontend root and main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/scripts/predeploy-verify.sh: Shell script that checks required frontend files, runs TypeScript checks, and performs a build before deployment.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router, authentication gating, theme provider, and route definitions.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory defining all backend service types and methods for actor creation.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Wraps children with authentication logic, showing loaders or login prompt depending on identity state.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth flow and related UI states.
frontend/src/components/common/CryptoCar: Reusable styled card component with optional glow effect.
frontend/src/components/common/ErrorBann: Displays a destructive alert banner with an error message.
frontend/src/components/common/NeonIndic: Shows a positive or negative percentage value with optional icon and color coding.
frontend/src/components/invest/BuyNowDia: Modal for submitting an investment amount with validation and plan purchase mutation.
Displays investment plan details and a Buy Now button inside a styled card.
Layout wrapper providing main content area and persistent bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/nav/BottomTabs.t: Renders fixed bottom navigation tabs and routes between app sections.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileO: Modal for completing user profile with email and optional referral code submission.
frontend/src/components/referrals/Referr: Displays referral earnings grouped by levels with stylized cards.
Shows referral statistics including team size and total earnings.
frontend/src/components/wallet/DepositWi: Provides tabs for deposit and withdrawal forms with validation and wallet mutations.
frontend/src/components/wallet/Transacti: Displays the user's latest transaction using wallet hooks, showing type, timestamp, amount, and status with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/data/sampleMarket.ts: Provides sample market data and a market overview object for UI display of crypto pairs and trends.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches and updates the caller's user profile using the actor with react-query caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for managing authentication, identity loading, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInvestmentPlans.ts: Fetches investment plans and allows users to buy plans by creating investment and transaction records.
frontend/src/hooks/useReferrals.ts: Retrieves the caller's referral earnings from the backend via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useWallet.ts: Handles wallet balance retrieval and deposit/withdraw mutations, generating corresponding transaction records.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, theme variables, crypto UI colors, and mobile optimizations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/Futures.tsx: Simple placeholder page showing a 'Coming Soon' message for futures trading.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Renders the home screen with hero banner, quick actions, market overview, and sample market list.
frontend/src/pages/Invitation.tsx: Referral dashboard page showing referral link, stats, and earnings table with copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/pages/Mine.tsx: User profile page displaying email, referral link, and quick navigation actions with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/News.tsx: Placeholder news page showing a coming-soon message for crypto updates.
frontend/src/pages/placeholders/Api.tsx: Placeholder API page showing a coming-soon message for API documentation.
frontend/src/pages/placeholders/Contract: Placeholder page for viewing past contract records with a no-records message.
Placeholder page for active contracts showing a no-active-contracts message.
frontend/src/pages/Quant.tsx: Investment plans page that lists available plans and opens a buy dialog when selected.
frontend/src/pages/Register.tsx: Registration page that handles referral codes and triggers login flow if user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/pages/Wallet.tsx: Wallet page displaying balance, deposit/withdraw options, and transaction history.
frontend/src/utils/referral.ts: Utility functions for generating referral links and extracting referral codes from URLs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters including hash-based handling.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Validation helpers for email format and numeric amount ranges.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration customizing colors, typography, container settings, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state for the Caffeine app including architecture notes, required features, known deployment issues, and existing implemented features with versions. Serves as a master state descriptor for planning and fixing build-related problems.
